data.name: Neon Drive - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Neon Drive Soundtrack by Pengus

All tracks are available in both MP3 and FLAC formats.
If you don't need FLACs, you can simply delete them to save disk space.



  • 01 Level 1 - City
  • 02 Level 2 - Miami
  • 03 Level 3 - SF
  • 04 Level 4 - Stardust
  • 05 Level 5 - Blade Driver
  • 06 Level 6 - Valkyrie
  • 07 Level 7 - Mechanics
  • 08 Main Menu Loop
  • 09 Trailer 1
  • 10 Trailer 2
  • 11 Level 1 - City (Hard)
  • 12 Level 2 - Miami (Hard)
  • 13 Level 3 - SF (Hard)
  • 15 Level 4 - Stardust (Hard)
  • 16 Level 5 - Blade Driver (Hard)
  • 17 Level 6 - Valkyrie (Hard)
  • 18 Level 7 - Mechanics (Hard)
  • 19 Level 1 - City (Insane)
  • 20 Level 2 - Miami (Insane)
  • 21 Level 3 - SF (Insane)
  • 22 Level 4 - Stardust (Insane)
  • 23 Level 5 - Blade Driver (Insane)
  • 24 Level 6 - Valkyrie (Insane)
  • 25 Level 7 - Mechanics (Insane)

data.short_description:
Neon Drive Soundtrack by Pengus

All 25 tracks are available in both MP3 and FLAC formats.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any OS
  • Processor: Any processor will do
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: No graphics required
  • Storage: 380 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: These are just MP3 and FLAC files

  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
